Laura Barrón-López discussed more with Jodi Grant of the Afterschool Alliance.

name: Education Funding
title: Trump administration withholds $10 million in grants from Denver Public Schools
description: The U.S. Department of Education pulled $71 million in education grants that fund afterschool and summer programs, professional development and teacher salaries.

name: Alabama
title: Teachers’ union reacts to $68M in federal funds for Alabama schools being under review
description: We’re hearing from a teachers’ union that represents many educators in our area about the potential impact of the Trump administration putting $68 million in federal money for Alabama schools on pause and under review. This could have a big impact on schools.

name: West Virginia
title: House Sends Budget Package To Trump’s Desk
description: By STEVEN ALLEN ADAMS For The Intelligencer CHARLESTON — Meeting a self-imposed deadline to get a bill to the desk of President Donald Trump by Independence Day, the U.S. House of Representatives passed the One Big Beautiful Bill Act Thursday. U.S. Reps. Carol Miller and Riley Moore, both R-W.Va., joined a slim majority in voting […]

name: Education Funding
title: Some education grants in limbo were used for 'leftwing agenda,' Trump administration says
description: The Trump administration has accused states and schools of using federal education grants to help fund "a radical leftwing agenda." The administration this week froze over $6 billion in federal education grants meant for immigrant and low-income students.

name: Arizona
title: Federal funding freeze could put migrant students in Arizona at risk
description: Arizona could lose out on $118 million in federal money if a funding freeze isn’t stopped and that would impact migrant and after-school programs. Migrant families in Yuma rely on summer and after-school programs to keep their children learning. Now those programs are in limbo. Alexandra Rangel reports.
